name: Nearby
body:
### Introduction
This is a simple example to show how to use [the Nearby Messages API (https://developers.google.com/nearby/messages/overview).

It's a simple Android App with EditText, Button and Toast developed on Android Studio.

### Official documentation
Please take a look at the official documentation in [Google Developers Page](https://developers.google.com/nearby/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
